name: LOOPY
description: $LOOPY is a community-driven meme coin inspired by Loopy, the beloved plushie mascot widely recognized in Korea. As a semi-aquatic animal, the beaver perfectly symbolizes the adaptable and innovative spirit of the Sui blockchain. $LOOPY on Sui is gaining significant attention thanks to high-quality 3D videos showcasing LOOPY in imaginative settings and unique, handcrafted outfits.
